author: National Geographic
description:
Kelvin Harrison Jr and Weruche Opia hoped their portrayals of Dr. Martin Luther King Jr and Coretta Scott King would allow others to relate to these historical icons and find inspiration in their stories. 

Watch the first episode of Genius: MLK/X on the Nat Geo YouTube channel.
title: Portraying Dr. Martin Luther King Jr and Coretta Scott King #GeniusMLKX
